Uses of Class
osyfe.graphic.util.Camera

  • Packages that use Camera 
    Package Description
    osyfe.graphic
    Manages graphical OpenGL objects.
    osyfe.graphic.util
    Contains graphics utilities such as cameras, text rendering and basic shape generation.

    • Uses of Camera in osyfe.graphic

      Methods in osyfe.graphic with parameters of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Framebuffer.bind(Camera camera)
      Binds this framebuffer as the rendering target and retrieves zNear and zFar from the given camera.

    • Uses of Camera in osyfe.graphic.util

      Methods in osyfe.graphic.util that return Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Camera Camera.addRot(float angle, float ax, float ay, float az)
      Rotates the camera.
      Camera Camera.addRot(float angle, int axis)
      Rotates the camera about its own coordinate axis.
      Camera Camera.addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f axis)
      Rotates the camera.
      Camera Camera.addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f position, int axis)
      Rotates the camera around the given position about its own coordinate axis.
      Camera Camera.addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f position, org.joml.Vector3f axis)
      Rotates the camera around the given position.
      Camera Camera.addTrans(float tx, float ty, float tz)
      Translates the camera.
      Camera Camera.addTrans(float dist, int axis)
      Translates the camera in the given direction.
      Camera Camera.addTrans(org.joml.Vector3f trans)
      Translates the camera.
      Camera Camera.mulZoom(float fac)
      Multiplies a zoom factor.
      Camera Camera.setAspect(float aspect)
      Sets the screen aspect.
      Camera Camera.setRot(org.joml.Matrix3f rot)
      Sets the camera orientation.
      Camera Camera.setRotIdentity()
      Sets the camera orientation to the identity.
      Camera Camera.setScaleX(float scalex)
      Sets the scale in the x-direction (default: 1).
      Camera Camera.setScaleY(float scaley)
      Sets the scale in the y-direction (default: 1).
      Camera Camera.setTrans(float tx, float ty, float tz)
      Sets the camera position.
      Camera Camera.setTrans(org.joml.Vector3f trans)
      Sets the camera position.
      Camera Camera.setZFar(float zFar)
      Sets the farthest rendered distance (default: 1).
      Camera Camera.setZNear(float zNear)
      Sets the nearest rendered distance (default: 1).
      Camera Camera.setZoom(float zoom)
      Sets the zoom factor (default: 1).
